author: Nor Hezry
comment: resync app but still not appear on my phone and watch

reply.author: Alex Mullis
reply.content: Depending on the watch,  it may take a little while to show up on the watch itself. This seems to be more of an Android Wear problem that I can't control. Give it time and the watchface will show up. If you have any further questions or comments feel free to email me. Thanks
